items.title: Remove unscoped protocol page
items.description: Remove the /protocol page as the offering has not been fully scoped. The page was using an outdated 'Workshop Authority' design system instead of the current 'Editorial Noir Institutional Perfection' theme. Rather than fix styling for an unready feature, remove it entirely. ADRs and i18n content preserved for future reference.

items.title: Reframe Programs section with AI Literate hierarchy
items.description: Restructure the Programs section to reflect reality: AI Literate as the umbrella brand with two formats underneath - Bootcamp (live virtual training, public) and Team Session (private, company-specific). Remove the third card (24-Hour Pilot Build) entirely until the offering is proven. Update copy to match advisory framing rather than productized workshop language.
